definition: rhyming verse
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poem/CL:首[shou3]/poetry/verse

sentences.english: Most of the scenes are written in verse, but some are in prose.
sentences.chinese: 她所寫的詩大部分都是無韻詩。

sentences.english: These three stanzas are also said to have been added by the reciters.
sentences.chinese: 這三段韻詩中據說也已補充到誦文中。

sentences.english: Blank verse is unrhymed iambic pentameter.
sentences.chinese: 無韻詩是不押韻的抑揚格五步格詩。

sentences.english: A poem With weak rhymes halts.
Yazi U. S. special, Clarins, Yun Miao these three which is the best?
sentences.chinese: 雅滋美特，嬌韻詩，蘊妙這三個哪個最好呢？

sentences.english: It has been pointed out that the stanza is older than the preceding prose passage in the Sutta.
sentences.chinese: 據說韻詩與前面佛經之中的段落相比要老一點。

sentences.english: It was in blank verse that she sang.
Ain't cha got no rhymes for me?
There are a number of stanzas (gàthà. ) scattered all over the Mahaparinibbana Sutta.
sentences.chinese: 在大般若涅磐經中分散着很多韻詩和偈子。

sentences.english: In Mahayana Chinese version also has find some stanzas.
sentences.chinese: 在大乘佛教的中文版本之中也發現了許多韻詩。

sentences.english: His editorial helloghlights confounding variables in the studies.
sentences.chinese: 他的案語強調了研究中嬌韻詩瘦腿的混雜變量。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter has only one stanza.
They have the common characteristic of alternation between dialogue and stanzas.
sentences.chinese: 在對話和韻詩之間他們有一般的特點。

sentences.english: Shakespeare's plays are written in blank verse.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞的劇本是用無韻詩體寫的。

definition: rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme

person who writes articles - newspapers, magazines, blogs (informal)/scribe/copyist/a talented writer of articles or of calligraphy
